summary: Alduin Texture Daedric Armor is a standalone which dose\'nt disrupt the original
descriptionHtml:
Alduin Texture Daedric Armor
--------------------------------------------------------------

Chest,boots,gloves\\gauntlets,helmet and shield are all enchantable also i bumped the armor rating up by 10 from the original.this is a standalone MOD so it wont disrupt the original Daedric Armor

Craftable at the forge
 
Temperable at the work table
 

---------------------------------------------------------------
Required
Skyrim

---------------------------------------------------------------
History
V1.0 Glow Release.
V1.1 no Glow Release.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this MOD freely. 
---------------------------------------------------------------
Credit
Photoshop
Nifskope
CreationKit

Bethesda for this Beautiful game!
author: SourandSweet
